definition: to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

pinyin: kuai4 ji4 zhun3 ze2 li3 shi4 hui4

sentences.english: And so, this actually is the input we needed to justify our criterion.
sentences.chinese: 这实际上是证明准则所需要的。

sentences.english: S. joint communiques and the fundamental norms governing international relations.
sentences.chinese: 它违背《中美三个联合公报》和基本的国际关系准则。

sentences.english: Convenience is， however， in all affairs of life， an execrable test of value.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在生活的一切事务中投合是可恶的实用准则。

sentences.english: Three types of four-parameter strength criterion based on new mechanical model are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 在新的力学模型上建立了三种类型的四参数强度准则。

sentences.english: Dress codes can work, but the assumption that clothing has a major.
sentences.chinese: 着衣准则确实有效，服装对着装者有主要的。

sentences.english: The rule of absolution for taking pities on destitution was related to relieving the disaster and reducing farm taxes and excising taxes.
sentences.chinese: 蠲恤则例是指救灾扶荒与蠲减税赋方面的法规或准则。

sentences.english: Financial instruments accounting standards (FIAS) are more complex and special than other accounting standards.
sentences.chinese: 金融工具准则在企业会计准则体系中较为特殊和复杂。

sentences.english: Financial instruments accounting standards (FIAS) are more complex and special than other accounting standards.
sentences.chinese: 金融工具准则在企业会计准则体系中较为特殊和复杂。

sentences.english: Ms. priority is a well-known code of conduct.
sentences.chinese: 女士优先是一个人人皆知的行为准则。

sentences.english: The accounting rules as they stand allow the practice.
sentences.chinese: 它们执行的会计准则允许这种做法。

sentences.english: Aigner herself claims to do as much as she can to follow these guidelines.
sentences.chinese: 艾格纳声称自己会尽可能遵守这些准则。

sentences.english: "Completion date issue date, date date high-ching" is the performance criteria.
sentences.chinese: “日事日毕，日清日高”是绩效准则。

sentences.english: The set of criteria for selecting configuration function are presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一套选择组态函数的准则。

sentences.english: On the influence of old new accounting postulates to borrowing costs capitalization.
sentences.chinese: 阐述新旧会计准则对借款费用资本化的影响。

sentences.english: This Ethics Code is binding upon all LEM employees.
sentences.chinese: 这一道德准则针对LEM所有员工。

sentences.english: A basis for COC consultations is the implementation of the DOC.
sentences.chinese: “准则”磋商是建立在落实《宣言》基础上的。

definition: to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to comply with/to abide by/to respect (an agreement)
